item.description:
Please join us for a ride!

Ride meetup time: 9:00am, ride to leave no later than 9:10
Location: Cutler Park http://www.mass.gov/d...
We will meet in the parking lot and leave/return from there.

Distance: 28 miles
(Looking to probably do an average of 16mph, but will be adjusted faster to accommodate group)

Here is the group leader's (Katie) cell phone number if people get lost and need help: 508-446-7309


For GPS systems and mapquest: 110 Kendrick St, Needham
or:
Drive 128/95 to Exit 19B (Highland Avenue toward Needham), take it, and continue about 0.1 miles to the first stop light. Turn left here; this is Hunting Road. Proceed roughly 0.6 miles to another stop light, the first one youâ€™ll come to after making the left onto Hunting Road, and turn left again. This is (take our word for it) Kendrick Street, though we offer a prize for the first of you to spot a road sign saying so. Continue about
0.3 miles on Kendrick, over Route 128/95, to Cutler Park on the right. It's prominently marked and features a capacious parking area.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot and leave/return from there
item.name: Saturday Road Ride- Meet at Cutler Park Needham/Dedham
